MANUAL: apt-sample-util (2.11.2)

apt-sample-util Application splits out samples by plate barcode. Creates separate folder, labeled by barcode, for each plate. Folder contains plate specific report, summary, confidence and calls files.

usage: apt-sample-util --run-split-node true --genotype-data-dir <dir> --combine (flag) = 2 column file containing folder name and barcodes of plates to be combined into single file(s). The headers should be 'folder_name' and 'barcodes' --out-dir --genotype-data-dir --out-dir 
   'apt-sample-util.exe'
   Version: 2.11.2 stash.amer.thermo.com/ma-alg/apt2-genotyping.git/release/APT_2.11.2@b8dccd45ec(8bdcdef44e) 2020-02-09-12:52
   

USER HELP ----------

	--version (flag) = Display the version info for this program.

	--user-help (flag) = Display help intended for end-users. Aliases: --help, -h

	--log-file (string8) = The name of the log file. Defaults to 'PROGRAMNAME-NUMBER.log'.
	Aliases: --lf

	--console-add-select (string8) = Add selectors for console messages. e.g. to include all debug messages: --console-add-select debug to include all messages of level 3 or higher: --console-add-select '*:3'

	--console-add-neg-select (string8) = Add selectors to be excluded from console messages. e.g. to exclude all warning messages and errors summary: --console-add-neg-select WARNING,summary

	--arg-file (filename) = Read arguments from this file. File should be a valid XML file, and should contain elements of the form .

	--check-param (flag) = Stop the program after the command parameters have been checked.

	--run-split-node (bool) = Split samples using plate barcode from large batch-wise genotyping results.
	default value: 'True'

	--genotype-data-dir (string8,required) = Directory containing batch-wise genotyping results (report, summary, calls, confidences)

	--out-dir (string8,required) = Directory for output

	--combine (string8) = File name containing combine options. If supplied, text file should be in 2 column format with headers ‘folder_name’ and ‘barcodes’.  Multiple plates can be combined into single folder.

	--@help = print developer help
